body:
Fixes #4112

This commit extends the support of the `AutotoolsPackage` methods `with_or_without` and `enable_or_disable` to bool-valued variants. It also defines for those function a convenience short-cut if the
activation parameter is the prefix of a spec (like in `--with-{pkg}={prefix}`).

I added a couple of examples to show how the packages would look like once ported.
title: 'with_or_without' accepts bool variants
